```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
```

## `pivot_longer`

Load the PULSE data

```{r, warning = FALSE}
pulse_df = 
  read_sas("data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

Let's try to pivot

```{r}
pulse_tidy = 
  pulse_df %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
    values_to = "bdi"
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    visit = replace(visit, visit == "bl", "00m"),
    visit = factor(visit)
  )
```

## `pivor_wider`

make up a results data table

```{r}
analysis_df = 
  tibble(
    group = c("treatment", "treatment", "control", "control"),
    time = c("a", "b", "a", "b"),
    group_mean = c(4, 8, 3, 6)
  )
analysis_df

analysis_df %>% 
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = "time",
    values_from = "group_mean"
  )
```
